original_title: アラビヨーンズナイト
overview: Modern schoolgirls have entered Arabian Nights.  They join forces with Aladdin, Alibaba, and Sindbad to create the greatest tale!  Dazzling, ominous, very mysterious, and very fun. That is... Arabeyooooonds Nights!  Engeki Joshibu musical starring BEYOOOOONDS. It is based on the Arabian Nights folk tales (also known as One Thousand and One Nights). The musical was originally set to run from April 17 to April 26, 2020.
title: AraBEYOOOOONDS Nights
